commit message: Added tag 1.53 (7) for changeset cb7b855bc925
Merge changes from Revision  37cac73c97b8 (https://code.google.com/r/igorlyubimov-ttrss-reader/source/detail?r=37cac73c97b841ff326018a6db3cc26c058d30f3) by Igor Lyubimov
Fixed cache path not ending with slash
Bugfixes and refactoring
Fix NPE
Merged updated german translation (thx to Martin Mueller)
Hide ActionBar consistently with the preferences
Startup-performance optimization
Avoid accessing ActionBar from fragments, should be done from the activities.

Implemented and enabled tablet layout
Not working yet:
- Long-press on items
- Actionbar-Operations

- Modified columns and behaviour of tablet layout
- Removed default-cases from optionItemSelected methods to support them when multiple fragments are displayed at once.

- Swipe on feedlist fixed
- Listitems got a configurable background, currently black
- DarkBackground set to black
Tablet stuff, mainly menu-related stuff. Article-Menu doesn't work yet.
Refactoring...
Fixed 'select all articles' from category
Disable custom background for now
Fix unnecessary warnings
Modified design of actionbar
TODO
Disable hiding of actionBar for tablet-layout
Only check newVersion when connected
Remove unused FeedActivity

- Removed unused ArticleActivity and merged functionality with FeedHeadlineActivity
- Modified refresh of resources after changes

- Highlight currently displayed object
- Listen for changes in adapter to find currently selected items by id
- Show divider between fragments
- Display all Menu-Items when showing article, else only the items for normal lists
- Fixed actionBar-items
Added connectivity preferences per wifi network, it is now possible to set connection, name, pw and bool lazyServer differently for every wifi-network the device already knows.

Version 1.6 Beta 1
* Added two-pane tablet-layout
* Added preference to set some preference based on which wifi-network is currently used
* Many changes to ImageCache and DB-access
* Updated german translation (thanks to Martin Mueller)
